General.Name: Guangzhou KDT Machinery Co Ltd
General.Description: Guangzhou KDT Machinery Co.,Ltd. engages in the production, and sale of special equipment for furniture machinery primarily in China. The company offers CNC panel saw, including rear and front loading, reciprocating panel, and precision panel saw; machining centers; banding machines; drilling centers; and automated production lines. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Guangzhou, China.
